name: Leigh D. Bugg in: Panic! At the Picnic
name_original: Leigh D. Bugg in: Panic! At the Picnic
description:
Leigh D. Bugg stars in Panic! At The Picnic - A Peaceful Puzzle Game

Guide Leigh D. Bugg through a puzzling maze of picnic tables and leftover dinner scraps! Make sure to get all your Babybugs to the end with you!

Made in 42 hours for the Create Jam Spring 2022 Edition, under the theme of "Cottagecore" and the prompt "A Picnic"!

Controls: 

Arrow Keys / WASD: Move

R: Reset Level

ESC: Go to the Main Menu

Developed by:

Tobi "Lunasticks" Risom (Coding, Design, "Art", Music)

With help from:

Lucie (Honestly deserves credit just for coming up with the pun "Babybugs")

Listen to the soundtrack on Soundcloud:

https://soundcloud.com/lunasticks/sunset-picnic-leigh-d-bugg-in-panic-at-the-pic...
